page.title: 07Leisure time
page.content: Most people in our class watch television and play games in their leisure time. The most popular games are football and netball. Riding bikes and birdwatching are two other hobbies.A pursuit which is becoming very popular is working with computers. Many boys enjoy making models using wood, paper, glue and odds and ends. The younger children play in the park on the swings, slide and roundabouts. Any spare time in school is either spent practising for Football, netball mini-rugby or reading.
